data.name: ChocolateyRemotePackageService_ExceptionFormat
data.comment: {0} = The Exception message that is associated with the error that is currently being thrown.

data.name: ChocolateyRemotePackageService_InstallFailedMessage
data.value: Failed to install package "{0}", version "{1}". Error: {2}{3}
data.comment: {0} = The name of the package that failed to install {1} = The version of the package that failed to install {2} = A collection of messages returned from Chocolatey {3} = The message of the exception that is being thrown

data.name: ChocolateyRemotePackageService_PinFailedMessage
data.value: Failed to pin package "{0}", version "{1}". Error: {2}{3}
data.comment: {0} = The name of the package that failed to pin {1} = The version of the package that failed to pin {2} = A collection of messages returned from Chocolatey {3} = The message of the exception that is being thrown

data.name: ChocolateyRemotePackageService_UninstallFailedMessage
data.value: Failed to uninstall package "{0}", version "{1}". Error: {2}{3}
data.comment: {0} = The name of the package that failed to uninstall {1} = The version of the package that failed to uninstall {2} = A collection of messages returned from Chocolatey {3} = The message of the exception that is being thrown

data.name: ChocolateyRemotePackageService_UnpinFailedMessage
data.value: Failed to unpin package "{0}", version "{1}". Error {2}{3}
data.comment: {0} = The name of the package that failed to unpin {1} = The version of the package that failed to unpin {2} = A collection of messages returned from Chocolatey {3} = The message of the exception that is being thrown

data.name: ChocolateyRemotePackageService_UpdateFailedMessage
data.comment: {0} = The name of the package that failed to update {1} = A collection of messages returned from Chocolatey {2} = The message of the exception that is being thrown

data.name: LocalSourceViewModel_ConfigFiles
data.comment: {0} = Is equal to (.config)|*.config

data.name: LocalSourceViewModel_UpdateAvailableForChocolatey
data.value: There's an update available for Chocolatey.

data.name: PackageViewModel_DisplayName
data.comment: {0} = Package Title

data.name: PackageViewModel_RanIntoInstallError
data.value: Ran into an error while installing {0}. {1}
data.comment: {0} = The package Id {1} = The exception message

data.name: PackageViewModel_RanIntoPinningError
data.value: Ran into an error while pinning {0}. {1}
data.comment: {0} = The package Id {1} = The exception message

data.name: PackageViewModel_RanIntoReinstallError
data.value: Ran into an error while reinstalling {0}. {1}
data.comment: {0} = The package Id {1} = The exception message

data.name: PackageViewModel_RanIntoUninstallError
data.value: Ran into an error while uninstalling {0}. {1}
data.comment: {0} = The package Id {1} = The exception message

data.name: PackageViewModel_RanIntoUnpinError
data.value: Ran into an error while unpinning {0}. {1}
data.comment: {0} = The package Id {1} = The exception message

data.name: PackageViewModel_RanIntoUpdateError
data.value: Ran into an error while updating {0}. {1}
data.comment: {0} = The package Id {1} = The exception message

data.name: PackageViewModel_StartLoadingFormat
data.comment: {0} = The command text {1} = The package id NOTE: Probably only necessary to change in RTL languages.

data.name: RemoteSourceViewModel_FailedToLoadRemotePackages
data.comment: {0} = The exception message that occured

data.name: RemoteSourceViewModel_LoadingPage
data.comment: {0} = The page that is loading

data.name: RemoteSourceViewModel_UnableToConnectToFeed
data.value: Unable to connect to feed with Source: {0}. Please check that this feed is accessible, and try again.
data.comment: {0} = The URL of the source that isn't accessible

data.name: SettingsViewModel_FeatureFailedToUpdate
data.comment: {0} = The exception arguments

data.name: SettingsView_ToggleShowConsoleOutputDescription
data.value: Shows output from the commands being executed when a job is running.

data.name: VersionNumberProvider_VersionFormat
data.comment: {0} = The Informational Version Number of the Assembly that is currently being executed

data.name: General_UnauthorisedException_Description
data.value: You may not have the appropriate permissions to perform this action.

data.name: LocalSourceView_ToolTip_InstalledSideBySide
data.value: Installed Side by Side with another version of the same package.

data.name: SettingsView_ToggleDefaultTileViewLocalDescription
data.value: Default to tile instead of list view. It is still possible to switch during use.

data.name: SettingsView_ToggleDefaultTileViewRemoteDescription
data.value: Default to tile instead of list view. It is still possible to switch during use.

data.name: SettingsView_ToggleUseDelayedSearchDescription
data.value: Enables live search, which returns results after a short delay without clicking the search button.

data.name: SettingsView_ToggleExcludeInstalledPackagesDescription
data.value: Do not show packages that are already installed when viewing sources.

data.name: SettingsView_ToggleShowAggregatedSourceViewDescription
data.value: Show additional source combining all sources in one place.

data.name: SettingsView_TogglePreventPreloadDescription
data.value: Prevents preloading results with a blank search when opening the remote source view.

data.name: SettingsView_TogglePreventAutomatedOutdatedPackagesCheckDescription
data.value: Prevents automated check for outdated packages on local and remote source views.

data.name: Command_CommandsListText
data.value: This is a listing of all of the different things you can pass to {0}.
data.comment: {0} = Is equal to 'chocolateyguicli'

data.name: Command_CommandsText
data.value: Please run {0} with '{0} -?' or '{0} <command> -?' for specific help on each command
data.comment: {0} = Is equal to 'chocolateyguicli'

data.name: Command_ExitCodesText
data.value:
Exit codes that normally result from running this command.
Normal: - 0: operation was successful, no issues detected - -1 or 1: an error has occurred

data.name: Command_LimitOutputOption
data.value: Limit the output to essential information

data.name: Command_NotFoundError
data.value: Could not find a command registered that meets '{0}'. Try {1} -? for command reference/help.
data.comment: {0} = Is the name of the command that couldn't be found. Shown if the end user is trying to run a feature that doesn't exist. {1} = Is equal to chocolateyguicli

data.name: ConfigCommand_ConfigNotFoundError
data.comment: {0} = Is the name of the configuration parameter that can't be found. Shown if the end user is trying to set a configuration parameter that doesn't exist.

data.name: ConfigCommand_Description
data.value: Retrieve and configure Chocolatey GUI config settings

data.name: ConfigCommand_Help
data.value: Chocolatey GUI CLI will allow you to interact with the persisted configuration information.

data.name: ConfigCommand_MissingNameOptionError
data.value: When specifying the subcommand '{0}', you must also specify {1} by option or position.
data.comment: {0} = The subcommand name that isn't being executed correctly. For example chocolateyguicli config get, where "get" is what would be shown. {1} = Is equal to --name

data.name: ConfigCommand_MissingValueOptionError
data.value: When specifying the subcommand '{0}', you must also specify {1} by option or position.
data.comment: {0} = The subcommand name that isn't being executed correctly. For example chocolateyguicli config get, where "get" is what would be shown. {1} = Is equal to --value

data.name: ConfigCommand_NameOption
data.value: The name of the config setting. Required with some actions. Defaults to empty.

data.name: ConfigCommand_SingleConfigError
data.value: A single config command must be listed. Please see the help menu for those commands

data.name: ConfigCommand_UnknownCommandError
data.comment: {0} = The unknown subcommand that the user tried to pass in. For example, if the user tried to run the command "chocolateyguicli config blah", here "blah" would be unrecognised, but rather than erroring the command, instead, the command "chocolateyguicli config list" will be executed. i.e. the subcommand has been set to "list" {1} = Is equal to 'list'

data.name: ConfigCommand_Unset
data.comment: {0} = The name of the configuration parameter which has been unset

data.name: ConfigCommand_Updated
data.comment: {0} = The name of the configuration property that has just been changed {1} = The value that has just been set for the configuration property

data.name: ConfigCommand_ValueOption
data.value: The value of the config setting. Required with some actions. Defaults to empty.

data.name: FeatureCommand_Description
data.value: View and configure Chocolatey GUI features

data.name: FeatureCommand_DisabledWarning
data.comment: {0} = The name of the feature that has just been disabled.

data.name: FeatureCommand_EnabledWarning
data.comment: {0} = The name of the feature that has just been enabled.

data.name: FeatureCommand_FeatureNotFoundError
data.comment: {0} = The name of the feature that couldn't be found. i.e. the user has attempted to get or set a feature with a name that doesn't exist.

data.name: FeatureCommand_Help
data.value: Chocolatey GUI will allow you to interact with features.

data.name: FeatureCommand_MissingNameOptionError
data.value: When specifying the subcommand '{0}', you must also specify {1}.
data.comment: {0} = The subcommand name that isn't being executed correctly. For example chocolateyguicli config get, where "get" is what would be shown. {1} = Is equal to --name

data.name: FeatureCommand_NameOption
data.value: The name of the feature. Defaults to empty.

data.name: FeatureCommand_NoChangeMessage
data.value: Nothing to change. Config already set.

data.name: FeatureCommand_SingleFeatureError
data.value: A single feature command must be listed. Please see the help menu for those commands.

data.name: FeatureCommand_UnknownCommandError
data.comment: {0} = The unknown subcommand that the user tried to pass in. For example, if the user tried to run the command "chocolateyguicli config blah", here "blah" would be unrecognised, but rather than erroring the command, instead, the command "chocolateyguicli config list" will be executed. i.e. the subcommand has been set to "list" {1} = Is equal to 'list'

data.name: SettingsView_ConfigOutdatedPackagesCacheDurationInMinutesDescription
data.value: Default timeout for outdated packages to be cached. Default is 60 minutes.

data.name: Command_UseFeatureCommandNote
data.value: NOTE: Use {0} to interact with features
data.comment: {0} = Is equal to "chocolateyguicli feature"

data.name: SettingsViewModel_InvalidSourceId
data.value: chocolatey.licensed is a reserved source id and cannot be used for a new source

data.name: SettingsViewModel_SetSourceCertificateAndPasswordMessage
data.value: NOTE: To remove the Certificate and Password, simply empty both input fields and click Save

data.name: SettingsViewModel_SetSourceUsernameAndPasswordMessage
data.value: NOTE: To remove the Username and Password, simply empty both input fields and click Save

data.name: SettingsView_ChocolateyLicensedSourceWarning
data.value: * The only modification that can be made to chocolatey.licensed source is to enable/disable it.

data.name: Dialog_AreYouSureIconsMessage
data.value: This action will delete all cached icons that appear on the Tile Views of Chocolatey GUI. Are you sure you want to proceed (this action cannot be undone)?

data.name: Dialog_AreYouSureOutdatedPackagesMessage
data.value: This action will delete the file containing the list of outdated packages for this computer. Are you sure you want to proceed (this action cannot be undone)?

data.name: PurgeCommand_Help
data.value: Chocolatey GUI will allow you to interact with purging caches used in application.

data.name: PurgeCommand_UnknownCommandError
data.value: Unknown command '{0}'. Valid values are {1} and {2}.
data.comment: {0} = The name of the unknown command that was passed by the user {1} = Is equal to "icons" {2} = Is equal to "outdated"

data.name: SettingsView_ToggleShowAdditionalPackageInformationDescription
data.value: Show additional package information on Local and Remote views.

data.name: SettingsView_ToggleAllowNonAdminAccessToSettingsDescription
data.value: Controls whether or not a non-administrator user can access the Settings Screen. NOTE: This feature will only work with Chocolatey for Business and the Chocolatey GUI licensed extension installed.

data.name: Error_DatabaseAccessCli
data.value: Unable to access Chocolatey GUI Configuration Database. This typically happens when Chocolatey GUI is already running. Please close all instances of the application, and try running the command again.

data.name: Error_DatabaseAccessGui
data.value: Unable to access Chocolatey GUI Configuration Database. This typically happens when Chocolatey GUI or Chocolatey GUI CLI is already running. Please close all instances of the application, and try running it again.

data.name: SettingsView_ToggleUseKeyboardBindings
data.value: Allows keyboard bindings to be used to interact with different areas of the Chocolatey GUI User Interface.

data.name: SettingsView_TogglePackageDownloadCountDescription
data.value: Allows control over whether package download count is displayed on remote source views.

data.name: RemoteSourceView_PreventPreloadHeading
data.value: The Prevent Preload feature is currently enabled.

data.name: RemoteSourceView_PreventPreloadSubHeading
data.value: Please search for a package using the search box above.

data.name: RemoteSourceView_SearchNoPackagesFoundHeading
data.value: Change the search string, and/or options used, and try again.

data.name: GlobalOption
data.value: Should the command be applied to the global (machine) level? Defaults to false.

data.name: FeatureCommand_ElevatedPermissionsError
data.value: Elevated permissions are required to set a feature at the global level.

data.name: ConfigCommand_ElevatedPermissionsError
data.value: Elevated permissions are required to set a config at the global level.

data.name: ConfigCommand_Unset_ElevatedPermissionsError
data.value: Elevated permissions are required to unset a config at the global level.

data.name: Fatal_Startup_Error_Formatted
Application_ContainerError
data.value: Could not locate any instances of contract {0}

data.name: Application_OutdatedPackagesError
data.value: Unable to serialize Outdated Packages Cache file.

data.name: SettingsView_TogglePreventAllPackageIconDownloads
data.value: Prevents the download of the icon for all package. NOTE: This feature will only work with Chocolatey for Business and the Chocolatey GUI licensed extension installed.

data.name: SettingsView_ConfigDefaultSourceName
data.value: The name of the source which should be shown by default when opening application. NOTE: This configuration setting will only work with Chocolatey for Business and the Chocolatey GUI licensed extension installed.

data.name: SettingsView_ToggleHideAllRemoteChocolateySources
data.value: Controls whether or not remote sources (for example the Chocolatey Community Repository) are displayed in Chocolatey GUI. Enabling this feature makes Chocolatey GUI a read-only application, that will only show the currently installed packages. NOTE: This feature will only work with Chocolatey for Business and the Chocolatey GUI licensed extension installed.

data.name: SettingsView_ToggleDefaultToDarkMode
data.value: Default to dark mode. It is still possible to switch during use.

data.name: Application_OperationInstall
data.value: Install the most recent package version

data.name: Application_OperationNotAllowed
data.value:
This operation is not available due to the global setting of:
backgroundServiceAllowedCommands configuration option
Please contact your System Administrator to enable this operation.

data.name: Application_OperationPin
data.value: Pin package to currently installed package version

data.name: Application_OperationReinstall
data.value: Reinstall the most recent package version

data.name: Application_OperationUninstall
data.value: Uninstall the currently installed package version

data.name: Application_OperationUnpin
data.value: Unpin from the currently installed package version

data.name: Application_OperationUpgrade
data.value: Update the currently installed package version

data.name: LocalSourceView_ButtonUpdateAllDisabled
data.value: No packages need to be updated

data.name: Dialog_AreYourSureRemoveSourceMessage
data.value: This action will remove the '{0}' source from both Chocolatey and Chocolatey GUI. Are you sure you want to proceed (this action cannot be undone)?
data.comment: {0} = The id of the source which is away to be deleted, i.e. chocolatey, chocolatey.licensed, etc

data.name: Dialog_AreYouSureUpdateAllMessage
data.value: This action, depending on the number of currently outdated packages, may take a long time to complete. Are you sure that you want to continue?

data.name: Dialog_AreYouSureReinstallMessage
data.value: This action will attempt to reinstall the '{0}' package. Are you sure you want to proceed?
data.comment: {0} = The id of the package that is going to be reinstalled

data.name: Dialog_AreYouSureUninstallMessage
data.value: This action will attempt to uninstall the '{0}' package. Are you sure you want to proceed?
data.comment: {0} = The id of the package that is going to be uninstalled
